meanings.definition: Give the impression of being something or having a particular quality.
meanings.sent1: She seems happy when she smiles.
meanings.sent2: It seems like a good idea to go for a walk.
meanings.sent3: The cat seems to think it's the boss of the house.
meanings.sent4: The old house seems to whisper stories of the past.
meanings.sent5: The stars seem to dance in the night sky.

meanings.definition: Have the appearance or quality of being.
meanings.sent1: The cake seems delicious with all that frosting.
meanings.sent2: He seems tired after a long day at work.
meanings.sent3: The movie seems to have a mind of its own, changing genres unexpectedly.
meanings.sent4: The forest seems to hold secrets within its ancient trees.
meanings.sent5: The waves seem to sing a lullaby as they crash against the shore.
